cs213.photoalbum.control

Interface IAdminControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminControl

    public interface IAdminControl
extends IControl
    Author:
    Conrado Uraga

    The class that implements this is created first when the program runs. Holds the control for "administering" the user that is run in the command line. Implemented methods are read command line args and to create, delete, or list users on the admin mode. Creates an interactive controller when the user logs in.

      • addUser

        void addUser(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String fullname,
           java.lang.String password,
           java.lang.String userimg)
        Adds new user into the list
        Parameters:
        username - identifies the newly created user
        fullname - The new user full name. If user the name already exists, pass an error to IErrorControl.
        password - The password to be associated with the user.
        userimg - The file path to the user's image.

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(java.lang.String username)
        delete the user off the list by passing an id
        Parameters:
        username - is found, we remove the user from the list. If not, we pass the error to IErrorControl.java
